item.title: Where Am I? - Using Google Geocoding API with Perl
item.description: Quite some time ago I stumbled across a similar blog post to this one which detailed how to access Google Maps' geocoding API to find latitude and longitude coordinates from a street address. The process is extremely simple, and I just thought I’d give a quick overview of how the whole thing works. So to start off with, the base URL for the API service we’ll be using is http://maps.google.com/maps/api/geocode/json?sensor=false&address=
